title: [Caffe2] Build failed with python 3.7
body_html:
Issue description

Build failed with python 3.7

Code example

Build caffe2 from the original PyTorch repo with python3.7. Then, hit a build error.
The error message:
[ 92%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_pybind11_state.dir/python/pybind_state.cc.o
In file included from /pytorch/caffe2/python/pybind_state.cc:1:
/pytorch/caffe2/python/pybind_state.h:200:19: error: assigning to 'char *' from incompatible type 'const char *'
str = PyUnicode_AsUTF8AndSize(input[i], &strSize);
^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_pybind11_state.dir/python/pybind_state.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_pybind11_state.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

System Info

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: caffe2
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • OS: mac
  • PyTorch version: af741dc
  • Python version: python 3.7

body:
## Issue description

Build failed with python 3.7

## Code example

Build caffe2 from the original PyTorch repo with python3.7. Then, hit a build error.
The error message:
[ 92%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_pybind11_state.dir/python/pybind_state.cc.o
In file included from /pytorch/caffe2/python/pybind_state.cc:1:
/pytorch/caffe2/python/pybind_state.h:200:19: error: assigning to 'char *' from incompatible type 'const char *'
            str = PyUnicode_AsUTF8AndSize(input[i], &strSize);
                  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_pybind11_state.dir/python/pybind_state.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_pybind11_state.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

## System Info
- PyTorch or Caffe2: caffe2
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- OS: mac 
- PyTorch version: af741dc2fd87bfb354906417595e82b8dc0d49f4
- Python version: python 3.7
